__e: I'm sorry, Ada, And for dragging you here,
- I thought you were here for me, to offer me some hope, to tell me about some new treatment, but you're here for her.
Look, I know you guys are here for me, and I appreciate that, but--
You might as well keep it.
Okay, well, I suppose you can stay for a day or two.
As far as I'm concerned, you can have her as often as you want.
- We can play something else like... Go Fish.
Okay, well, I suppose you can stay for a day or two.
As far as I'm concerned, you can have her as often as you want.
If I had some, maybe. Right now, I don't have a penny.
Be my guest, but I don't think it'd do you any good.
Maybe, but there's nothing here now.
What a brave man, Mrs. Packard.
Don't worry about me. I'll be all right.
Don't worry about me. I'II be fine. I will.
Well, you did. Now it's another thing on the list of "things I don't have because I'm with Lorelai."
And I'm sorry I killed you... and that you're no longer alive because of me.
Look, I can't pretend that you didn't hurt me, because you did, but this is happening because of me.
No, she's only in this situation because of me.
He won't go anyway near because of me even I've ? told him.
You do understand it's because of me that she's in danger?
